tool_description:
Using one of the best AI of the world like GPT3, we suggest headlines and digital ads copy for:
Google ads
Facebook ads
Microsoft ads
Only with the URL of your web site
name: Text Ads Generator By URL
title: Text Ads Generator By URL

api_list.name: headlines descriptions generator
api_list.description: generated headlines and descriptions to an specific URL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-ads-generator-by-url.p.rapidapi.com/op-generate-headlines-descriptions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-ads-generator-by-url.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
